By signing this document I confirm the following:
○ I am not experiencing any COVID-19 symptoms, such as fever, a cough, sore/scratchy throat, shortness of breath, loss of smell or loss of taste.
○ To the best of my knowledge, I am not required to quarantine or self -isolate for any reason.
